channel.title: How to add ::item spawning command to 562
channel.description: hi How can i add the ::item command to my 562 source i use jagex scape 562. (updated version)

item.title: How to add ::item spawning command to 562
item.dc:creator: @jazzminerules jazzminerules
item.description:
@jazzminerules wrote:

Src>Com>rs2hd>packethandler>commandspackethandler.java (not commandpackethandler.java thats admin screen use one after that)

And add this…
else if(cmd[0].equals("::item")) {
if(cmd.length == 2 || cmd.length == 3) {
int item = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]);
int amount = 1;
if(cmd.length == 3) {
amount = Integer.valueOf(cmd[2]);
}
player.getInventory().addItem(item, amount);
} else {
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“Syntax is: ::item [amount=1].”);
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: How to add ::item spawning command to 562
